settings.title: The Fit Dictionary
settings.text: Monday Swimwear understands that all bodies are unique and our mission is to create suits that celebrate all different body types and let individuality shine. That‚Äôs why we obsess about fit and don‚Äôt overlook a single detail. Click to see our fit guide and recommendations so you can find your perfect fit!

settings.title: Forever About Fit
settings.text: Monday Swimwear understands that all bodies are unique and our mission is to create suits that celebrate all different body types and let individuality shine. That‚Äôs why we obsess about fit and don‚Äôt overlook a single detail. Click to see our fit guide and recommendations so you can find your perfect fit!

settings.title: The V Range
settings.text:
We renamed XL & XXL sizes to ‚ÄúV‚Äù for Voluptuous and ‚ÄúVV‚Äù for Very Voluptuous to better represent the women wearing them.

Monday Co-Creator, Devin Brugman has always struggled to find swimwear that was supportive enough for her DDD cup bust. Her mission with the ‚ÄúV‚Äô Range is to provide women with classy, chic, and comfortable suits for larger cup sizes. Naturally, the next step was to expand this range. We are proud to design bottoms, one pieces and beachwear suited for those size 12-18 US.

settings.title: Take our quiz and we‚Äôll help find your perfect fit.
The Aruba One Piece
settings.description: The Aruba One Piece is arguably our most flattering and versatile swimsuit. Designed in our Signature buttery soft fabric with a supportive under-bust band, a deep V-neckline and supportive wide straps ‚Äî that offer comfort for every figure.
settings.highlights: V neckline, wide shoulder straps, supportive under bust band
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-G

settings.title: The Bahamas One Piece
settings.description: The Bahamas One Piece offers a comfortable and timeless look. Designed with a built-in-bra shelf for extra support and a mid- high cut leg, this one piece is universally flattering on all body shapes.
settings.highlights: Rounded neckline, built-in bra with removable padding, high leg, low back
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-E

settings.title: The Corsica One Piece
settings.description: The Corsica is our newest one piece crush! The underbust detail adds that extra support for all bust sizes and its mid to high cut leg is flattering on all body shapes.
settings.highlights: Supportive under-bust band detail, mid-back cut out, can be worn as a high leg
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-E

settings.title: The Portofino One Piece
settings.description: The Portofino One Piece is complemented by a structured support panel under the bust featuring adjustable straps for extra support and a high leg ‚Äî made to accentuate every figure.
settings.highlights: Deep V neckline, supportive waist panel, adjustable shoulder straps
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes B-DDD

settings.title: The Sardinia One Piece
settings.description: The Sardinia One Piece is a well-fitted and timeless one piece made to take you from day to night. Featuring a chic silhouette, this classic one piece is complete with a flattering square neckline, open back, high leg and moderate coverage.
settings.highlights: Square neckline, open back, wide supportive straps, high leg
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-D

settings.title: The Sicily One Piece
settings.description: Chic and new, the Sicily One Piece has become one of our best-sellers. With an adjustable one-shoulder¬†design, a rounded neckline¬†and moderate coverage, this figure flattering one piece¬†transitions from sand to seaside lunch in a snap.
settings.highlights: Rounded neckline, adjustable 1-shoulder strap, low back, high leg
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes AA-E

settings.title: The Antigua Bottom
settings.description: Complementing every shape, the Antigua Bottom is the perfect way to accentuate your waist. Complete with a high-cut leg and supportive waistband with a chunky gold ring. The higher leg shape elongates your figure and gives a cheekier back coverage.
settings.highlights: High cut leg, high waisted fit, supportive waistband with chunky gold ring detail

settings.title: The Argentina Bottom
settings.description: Whether you opt for the beach or pool, the Argentina Bottom is the perfect way to accentuate your waist. Designed in a buttery soft fabric, this high waisted bottom features a high cut leg, supportive waistband, cheeky coverage‚Äîthat will complement every figure.
settings.highlights: High cut leg, high waisted fit, supportive waistband

settings.title: The Barbados Bottom
settings.description: Minimal tanlines await in the the Barbados Bottom. This flattering bikini bottom features thin straps and a subtle high cut leg with a cheeky coverage.
settings.highlights: Thin side straps
settings.fit_tip: For a comfortable and flattering fit, we suggest to size up one size.

settings.title: The Byron Bottom
settings.description: The Byron Bottom is one of the newest bottoms to be added to our range, and an instant favorite. Its high leg style is universally flattering and the notoriously soft Monday Swimwear fabric ensures it does not dig in.
settings.highlights: High-leg cut, mid-rise bottom

settings.title: The Byron Thong
settings.description: The Byron Thong was thoughtfully designed to show off your figure. Giving your cheeks minimal coverage with the thong coverage, this bottom is finished with an easy pull on fit for the perfect tan.
settings.highlights: Seamless, fully lined, thong coverage

settings.title: The Cala Conta Bottom
settings.description: It's all about the details in the Cala Conta Bottom. Featuring side cutouts, adjustable ties and a cheeky coverage, this flirty bottom shows off your silhouette while giving you the perfect fit every time.
settings.highlights: High leg, loop through side hip detail with adjustable tie side

settings.title: The Clovelly Bottom
settings.description: The Clovelly Bottom is one of our best selling bottoms. Designed with wide side panels and the perfect amount of stretch, this bottom is complete with cinched fabric made to flatter all body shapes.
settings.highlights: Ruching detail at front, seamless

settings.title: The Hanalei Bottom
settings.description: Satisfy your sun-soaking needs in the Hanalei Bottom. A play off of our famous Palma Bottom, this classic string bottom features dainty gold rings and adjustable ultra-thin straps for a barely-there feel.
settings.highlights: Adjustable side ties with gold hardware detail, dainty gold rings, seamless

settings.title: The Isla Mujeres Bottom
settings.description: Find the perfect fit in the Isla Mujeres Bottom. Thoughtfully designed to give as little or as much coverage as you want, this body-baring bikini features an adjustable front ruching and side tie details.
settings.highlights: Adjustable front ruching detail, adjustable side ties with gold hardware detail

settings.title: The Maui Bottom
settings.description: The Maui Bottom is an instant favorite to our best selling bottoms. Offering a figure flattering touch with the adjustable side ties and cheeky coverage, this bottom is made to give you a relaxed and confident look no matter your shape!
settings.highlights: Thick adjustable side ties, seamless

settings.title: The Palma Bottom
settings.description: The Palma Bottom is shaped to flatter and accentuate your booty! This tie-sided triangle bikini bottom features small detailed gold hardware hanging from each tie.
settings.highlights: Adjustable side ties gold hardware detail

settings.title: The Riviera Bottom
settings.description: The Riviera bottom is a true high-waist bottom with a flattering high-cut leg. This cut enhances curves and flatters the midsection and backside.
settings.highlights: High waist, supportive waistband, seamless

settings.title: The Seychelles Bottom
settings.description: The Seychelles Bottom is an update version of our best selling Byron Bottom. Made to make your legs look instantly longer with the high cut silhouette while giving you  moderate coverage.
settings.highlights: High leg cut, mid-rise, seamless

settings.title: The Sorrento Bottom
settings.description: The Sorrento Bottom is the perfect option for a full coverage look. Designed with a higher and wider coverage, this figure flattering bottom accentuates your legs, keeps you covered in all the right places and is bound to become your go-to.
settings.highlights: High waist, supportive waistband, seamless

settings.title: The Tamarama Bottom
settings.description: The Tamarama Bottom is our newest bikini bottom featuring everything you need: less coverage and thinner sides. Similar to the Byron Bottom & Java Bottom, the high leg cut elongates your silhouette while the cheeky coverage gives you the perfect tan.
settings.highlights: High leg cut, thin sides, seamless

settings.title: The Tulum Bottom
settings.description: The Tulum Bottom is our most versatile suit in our collection. Designed to accommodate all of your swimwear needs. The adjustable tabs can be customized to your desired coverage ‚Äî from Brazilian to full coverage.
settings.highlights: Adjustable tabs front and back for adjustable coverage

settings.title: The Antigua Top
settings.description: The Antigua top brings us back to 90's Cindy Crawford in editorial covers. The asymmetrical style has dual details with the 1-shoulder scoop and the other is strapless. This flattering silhouette has a little more support than our Costa Rica bandeau with the same gold hardware. Side boning to keep its shape, removable adjustable strap and soft-tie back closure.
settings.highlights: Bandeau with removable padding, removable and adjustable strap, back tie closure, side boning
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-G

settings.title: The Aruba Top
settings.description: The Aruba Top is and over-the-shoulder soft cup style that offers flattering support to a wide range of sizes. Features adjustable back tie closure for a custom fit.
settings.highlights: V neckline, supportive under-bust band, wide straps, adjustable back tie closure
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-G.

settings.title: The Bahamas Top
settings.description: The Bahamas Top - Inspired by our favorite 1pc style that has been a staple since the beginning.  Classic scoop neckline with sexy spaghetti straps that are adjustable.  This top has a moderate neckline coverage with an adjustable soft-tie back.
settings.highlights: Straight neckline, thin shoulder straps, adjustable back tie closure
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-D.

settings.title: The Barbados Top
settings.description: The Barbados Top is our newest triangle bikini top made for the perfect fit.
settings.highlights: Adjustable shoulder straps with gold slider, adjustable back closure with gold hardware details
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-D.

settings.title: The Bora Bora Top
settings.description: The Bora Bora Bandeau is special because of its thoughtful design details. Featuring a removable strap adjustable for those who want extra support and a strapless option for wear and tanning. Complete with side boning for shape stability without riding up.
settings.highlights:
Bandeau with removable padding, removable and adjustable halter strap, side boning 
pull on style
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-G.

settings.title: The Cabo San Lucas Top
settings.description: Made for movement: the Cabo San Lucas top. Thoughtfully designed to give you support and a flattering shape, this customer favorite top is complete with a scoop neckline, and adjustable back tie closure and is fully lined.
settings.highlights: Scoop neckline, adjustable back tie closure, fully lined
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-E.

settings.title: The Cala Conta Top
settings.description: Introducing our newest underwire top, the Cala Conta Bandeau. Thoughtfully designed to double as a bandeau with the removable & adjustable strap detail. Complete with a "U" wire detail, underwire support and an adjustable back tie closure, this flirty top is perfect for your spring get away.
settings.highlights: Underwire cups with u-wire detail, removable and adjustable strap, back tie closure
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes B-DD

settings.title: The Clovelly Top
settings.description: The Clovelly Top is one of our best sellers due to its flattering yet supportive design. Features a built in underwire that never digs, adjustable over the shoulder straps and a tie back, allowing you to find the most comfortable fit for your body.
settings.highlights: Deep V front detail, underwire cups, adjustable shoulder straps and back tie closure
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes B-E.

settings.title: The Copacabana Top
settings.description: A classic triangle top with a modern twist. The Copacabana Top was designed with bandeau styled cups finished with fully adjustable neck and back ties for a head turning look!
settings.highlights: Bandeau shaped cups with removable padding, adjustable neck and back tie with gold hardware detail
settings.fit: Designed to flatter all shapes and sizes.

settings.title: The Costa Rica Top
settings.description: Designed from recycled fibers, the Costa Rica Top top features a center front gold hardware loop and a removable halter strap that can be adjusted for the perfect amount of lift and support for all your beach adventures.
settings.highlights: Bandeau with removable padding, removable and adjustable halter strap, adjustable back tie closure, side boning
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-D.

settings.title: The Formentera Top
settings.description: The Formentera Top is our newest underwire top that gives you cleavage, support, lift, shape, and confidence. Featuring tall underwire triangle cups, wide shoulder straps and adjustable back tie closure.
settings.highlights: Tall underwire triangle cups, adjustable straps and back tie closure
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-DDD.

settings.title: The Hanalei Top
settings.description: The Hanalei Top is a play on from our famous Palma Top. Designed with classic triangle coverage and adjustability, this barley-there top features dainty gold rings, ultra-thin straps and the same underbust support you'd expect.
settings.highlights: Triangle cups with removable padding, dainty gold rings, adjustable thin back and neck tie with gold hardware detail
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-G.

settings.title: The Isla Mujeres Top
settings.description: The Isla Mujeres Top was thoughtfully designed to lift & sculpt your cup. Featuring a supportive underwire cup, adjustable ruched cup details and adjustable ties, the perfect fit can be found in this bikini top.
settings.highlights: V front detail with adjustable ruching, underwire cups, adjustable straps and back tie closure with gold hardware details
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-E.

settings.title: The Jamaica Top
settings.description: The Jamaica Top is designed in a buttery soft fabric, this swim top features a scoop neckline and adjustable back tie closure‚Äîand doubles as a crop top.
settings.highlights: Scoop neckline, adjustable back tie closure
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-G.

settings.title: The Maui Top
settings.description: Find the perfect fit while wearing the Maui Top. With its classic silhouette and feminine details, this underwire top is complete with adjustable sliders and back tie closure.
settings.highlights: V front detail, underwire cups, adjustable straps and back tie closure with gold hardware details
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-DDD.

settings.title: The Palma Top
settings.description: Our Palma Top is not just your average triangle bikini top. Thoughtfully designed to flatter all shapes and sizes, the triangle cups feature a curvature and "tear drop" design complete with adjustable shoulder straps, a traditional tie back and halter neck‚Äîfor a custom fit!
settings.highlights: Triangle cups with removable padding, adjustable back and neck tie with gold hardware detail
settings.fit: Designed to flatter all shapes and sizes.

settings.title: The Portugal Top
settings.description: The Portugal Top is one of the Monday team's favorite style. Made from recycled fibers, this figure flattering silhouette offers a supportive under-bust band, an accentuating V neckline, wide straps and an adjustable front tie back closure for a custom fit.
settings.highlights: V neckline, wide straps, supportive under-bust band, adjustable front tie closure
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-G.

settings.title: The Puerto Rico Top
settings.description: The Puerto Rico Top was made to be your favorite. Designed with a modern square neckline, supportive wide straps and an adjustable back tie closure for the perfect sun-soaking look‚Äîand doubles as a crop top.
settings.highlights: Square neckline, wide straps, adjustable back tie closure, princess seams
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-E.

settings.title: The Sicily Top
settings.description: For sunning, lounging and dining, the Sicily Top effortlessly transitions you through your itinerary. Designed in a buttery soft fabric, this figure flattering bikini top compliments your body with its sleek asymmetrical design and gives you the perfect fit with the adjustable shoulder strap and back tie closure.
settings.highlights: Adjustable one shoulder strap, back tie closure, side boning
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-E.

settings.title: The Tamarama Top
settings.description: A much needed vacation is on the horizon. Elevate your classic bikini tops in the Tamarama Top. Designed for minimal tan lines in mind with thin adjustable ties and bandeau shaped cups, this top will have you looking & feeling your best.
settings.highlights: Bandeau shaped cups with removable padding, adjustable back tie with gold hardware detail
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-D.

settings.title: The Tulum Top
settings.description: The Tulum Top is one the most supportive tops in our collection that is suitable for all shapes and sizes. The adjustable tabs allow you to alter the size of each triangle based off your size, shape, or even mood! Featuring a thick necktie designed for extra supportive and comfort around your neck.
settings.highlights: Movable tabs on front for adjustable coverage, adjustable neck and back ties
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-G.

settings.title: The Acapulco Top
settings.description: Made for the summer sun: The Acapulo Top. Offering the perfect fit, this linen crop top features an adjustable back tie closure and gathered puff sleeves complete with elasticated sleeves and hem for the best support.
settings.highlights: More than just a top, the Acapulco Top is the most versatile summer piece you can choose. This linen crop top offers the perfect fit with its adjustable back tie closure and gathered puff sleeves while the elasticated sleeves and hem lend support.

settings.title: The Barcelona Tunic
settings.description: Whether you wear it open, over your favorite swimwear or tied at the front with cute pants, the Barcelona Tunic is the perfect transitional piece. Complete side slits, flowy long sleeves and center front seashell buttons.
settings.highlights: The Barcelona Tunic is the perfect on and off the beach look. Featuring an oversized fit, side slits, flowy long sleeves and center front buttons.
settings.fit: Runs oversized, size down for less wide fit

settings.title: The East Hampton Short
settings.description: The East Hampton Short is made of a lightweight rib knit blend, that effortlessly finishes off any look. Designed with versatility in mind and to crossover from being beach-friendly coverups, this must-have short is features an elastic waistband with an adjustable drawstring and a high leg cut.
settings.highlights: From the chic rib fabric and sheer silhouette, the East Hampton Short gives your wardrobe a refresh.

settings.title: The Hamilton Island Sweater
settings.description: Our first knit sweater, the Hamilton Island Sweater. Designed in a breathable fabric, this casual cute knit is the perfect piece to keep you covered after a quick ocean dip or perfectly pairs over biker shorts for a coffee run. Complete with a v-neckline, ribbed cuffs and a comfy oversized fit.
settings.highlights: For when warm days turn into chilly nights, our new Hamilton Island Sweater is here. With an easy fit and chic look, this is the piece to keep your evening going.

settings.title: The Hampton Pant
settings.description: Ditch the denims and opt for chic linen in the Hamptons Pant. Made to show off your silhouette with its tailored fit, this must-have pant is complete with a back zip closure and kick crop flare. Pair with the Hamptons Top for an effortless look!
settings.highlights: The Hamptons Pant makes a statement with its flattering high waist and tailored fit. Complete with a back zip closure and a kick crop flare.

settings.title: The Hamptons Dresss
settings.description: Slip into the Hamptons Dress for a feminine and romantic look. Versatile and chic, this rib knit flaunts an airy fabric that grazes the body, showing off your silhouette with its sheer finish. Designed in a neutral hue complete with a low back neckline, midi length and a single side slit.
settings.highlights: Giving your beachwear cover-ups an elevated look, the Hamptons Dress effortlessly transitions your beach to dinner attire. Complete with a low back neckline, midi length, a single side slit and sheer finish.

settings.title: The Hamptons Top
settings.description: The Hamptons Top was made for relaxing poolside. Designed with vacation mode in mind, this summery crop top features tailored short sleeves with a wrap front detail to ensure the perfect fit.
settings.highlights: The Hamptons Top features vacation style t-shirt sleeves and a cropped bodice, perfect for a hot summer day. It even has a tie front so you can adjust the fit to your liking.

settings.title: The Kythira Dress
settings.description: From cityscape to the sand bar, the Kythira Dress proves it's the perfect wardrobe companion for any locale. With an open neckline and adjustable wrap tie, this figure-flattering dress is tailored for the perfect fit.
settings.highlights: The perfect summer dress awaits: the Kythira Dress. Designed with an open neckline and adjustable wrap tie, this figure-flattering dress is tailored for the perfect fit.

settings.title: The La Jolla Shirt
settings.description: From the pool to cocktails, the La Jolla Shirt was made to give you a chic and effortless look. Designed in a lightweight airy cotton, this classic shirt is finished with a collar, pocket detail, long sleeves and center front buttons. Show off your summer skin by pairing it with the La Jolla Shorts.
settings.highlights: The La Jolla Shirt is the perfect boyfriend style beach top. Made with a cotton poplin fabric, it features an oversized fit, center front buttons, and a collar.

settings.title: The La Jolla Short
settings.description: Designed in a lightweight airy cotton with a smocked waistband, the La Jolla Short is complete with an adjustable front tie and a relaxed fit that perfectly pairs with the La Jolla Shirt and your favorite bikini.
settings.highlights: With its relaxed fit and drawstring waist, the La Jolla Short was made to transition you from a morning coffee run to an afternoon dip.

settings.title: The Malibu Linen Robe
settings.description: Sip cocktails in the Malibu Linen Robe. Designed in a light, airy linen, this sophisticated summer cover-up doubles up as a dress with its feminine silhouette, tailored sleeves, adjustable waist tie and chic side pockets. Perfectly made to transition you from day to night.
settings.highlights: With its light airy fabric, the Malibu Linen Robe was thoughtfully designed to double up as a dress to transition you from day to night. Complete with a feminine silhouette, tailored sleeves, an adjustable waist tie and chic side pockets.

settings.title: The Montauk Pant
settings.description: The Montauk Pant is a part of our newest knitwear collection. Designed to give your wardrobe a luxe upgrade, this neutral knit lends a clean and sophisticated look with its airy fit and chic rib detailing. Effortlessly transitions you from a throw-on beach pant to a chic dinner pant.
settings.highlights: The luxe staple you've been waiting for: the Montauk Pant. This neutral knit pant is finished with a wide waistband, a pull on fit , chic rib detailing and sheer finish.

settings.title: The Montauk Top
settings.description: No matter what the occasion or vibe your searching for, we can guarantee compliments in Montauk Top. Made to instantly elevate your look without the frills, this cropped long-sleeve features a flattering neckline, adjustable wrap ties that fasten at the side and clean binding details. Can be worn with the East Hampton Short, Montauk Pant, or on its own with high-waist jeans or shorts.
settings.highlights: A sophisticated way to bundle up in the Montauk Top. Designed with a crop fit, long-sleeves, a flattering neckline, adjustable wrap ties that fasten at the side and clean binding details.

settings.title: The Mykonos Sarong
settings.description: Shorter than our Amalfi Sarong, the Mykonos Sarong was designed in a lightweight airy fabric with a semi-sheer finish and custom fit.
settings.highlights: The Mykonos Sarong is the perfect cover-up to lounge all day in and stroll along the beach in. This beautiful airy sarong features a bright key lime hue finished with a semi-sheer style that ties effortlessly around the waist.

settings.title: The Noosa Top
settings.description: Lightweight and chic, the Noosa Top will make you feel as cool as you look. Featuring a halter neck, adjustable ties, this linen tank is perfect for the warm months ahead. Pair with the Hamptons Pant or your favorite jeans.
settings.highlights: The Noosa Top offers a chic upgrade to wardrobe Effortlessly transients you from day to night, this linen tank is flaunts a halter neckline with adjustable ties to compliment any bottom.

settings.title: The Palm Beach Top
settings.description: From backyard BBQs to sunset cocktails, the Palm Beach Top is made to transition you through summer. Featuring a supple airy linen, this crop top offers versatility with its wear from the adjustable ties, elasticated sleeves and deep v neckline. Pair with the La Jolla Short for the perfect summery set.
settings.highlights: The Palm Beach Top is a summer classic. Designed in an airy linen, this crop top features versatility with the adjustable ties, deep v neckline and elasticated sleeves.

settings.title: The San Miguel Short
settings.description: Find comfort while wearing the San Miguel Short. Designed in an airy lightweight fabric, this summery short features a smocked waistband with a wrap front detail finished with a relaxed and comfortable fit.
settings.highlights: Flattering for every silhouette, the  lightweight fabric, this summery short features a smocked waistband with a wrap front detail finished with a relaxed and comfortable fit. Pair with the Tahiti Tie Top for a chic vacation wardrobe.

settings.title: The Sorrento Caftan
settings.description: Slip into the Sorrento Caftan for a feminine and romantic look. Versatile and chic, this caftan flaunts an airy fabric in a summery hue complete with a deep v-neckline with a removable thin waist tie, side slits and pockets.
settings.highlights: The Sorrento Caftan lends the perfect summer look for any destination. Featuring an airy fabric complete with a flattering deep v-neckline with a removable waist tie, side slits and pockets.

settings.title: The Tahiti Pant
settings.description: With its small, tassel tie detail and flared wide-leg, the flowy Tahiti Pant is the perfect beach pant. Fully-lined and featuring an elastic drawstring waist, it will flatter every figure.
settings.highlights: With its flowy wide leg and drawstring waist, the Tahiti Pant was made for beachwear perfection.
settings.fit: True to size meant to be flowy and wide leg

settings.title: The Tahiti Tank
settings.description: With its flattering shape and fit the Tahiti Tank is the lightweight top you've been needing. Designed with a deep V neck and a stylish tie front, this summery top can be worn different ways and is complete with an elastic band hidden in the back, for that perfect fit.
settings.highlights: The Tahiti Tank was made for a chic and relaxed look. Designed with a deep V front and an airy, sleeveless silhouette. Complete with ties and hidden elastic band.
settings.fit: True to size meant to be flowy

settings.title: The Tahiti Tie Top
settings.description: With its deep V front and elegant billowing sleeves, the Tahiti Tie Top pairs perfectly with any bottom or easily double up as a cute crop with jeans. It ties in the front and has an elastic band hidden in the back, for that perfect fit.
settings.highlights: The Tahiti Tie Top was made for a chic and relaxed look. Designed with a deep V front and elegant billowing sleeves. Complete with ties and hidden elastic band.
settings.fit: True to size meant to be flowy and wide

settings.title: I am located in the US, what is your return policy?
settings.answer:
We happily accept returns in original condition (unused, unworn, and unaltered) with tags and liners attached for either a refund, exchange, or store credit.

All return requests must be made within 14 days after the date of delivery. The refund, store credit, or exchange will be processed within 14 business days from the date of the returned package.

We can only process a refund back to the original payment method and we charge a restocking fee of $6.95 per return order and we do not refund any shipping fees.

Items that are purchased on sale are final sale. They cannot be returned or exchanged, and no exceptions will be made for any fit or sizing issues.

settings.title: I am an international customer, what is your return policy?
settings.answer: We happily accept returns in original condition (unused, unworn, and unaltered) with tags and liners attached for either a refund or store credit. All return requests must be made within 14 days after the date of delivery. The refund will be processed within 14 business days from the date of the returned package. We can only process a refund back to the original payment method and we do not refund any shipping fees. We do not provide return labels nor cover any cost incurred when shipping back your return. For Canadian orders, we offer return labels and exchanges. However we charge a restocking fee of $15 per return order and we do not refund any shipping fees. Items that are purchased on sale are final sale. They cannot be returned or exchanged, and no exceptions will be made for any fit or sizing issues.

settings.title: How do I return if I am an international customer?
settings.answer: We are sorry to hear you are needing to return! Please use this link to start your return.

settings.title: What is your return policy for sale items and orders placed with a discount code?
settings.answer: Any item purchased on sale or at a marked down price is final sale and ineligible for any form of return or exchange. If a discount code was applied to a full retail priced item, the item is not final sale unless if the discount code is advertised as final sale. We do not offer any exceptions for this policy.

settings.title: If I return an order that had a discount code applied, will the discount code be available again for a new purchase?
settings.answer: Our discount codes are for one time use and are unable to be reloaded if you return your order.

settings.title: When will my exchange ship out?
settings.answer: We are sorry to hear you needed to return/exchange! When you submit an exchange it is not processed until the return has been sent back and the tracking label has updated to in transit with your returned products. Once your exchange has been processed, an order confirmation email will be sent over via email.

settings.title: Does my exchange get charged a $6.95 restocking fee?
settings.answer: We do not charge a restocking fee for exchanges or returns for store credits. Start a return.

settings.title: When will my order be fulfilled?
settings.answer: Our team asks for 1-7 business days to fulfill packages. Once your package has been fulfilled, an email will be sent confirming the tracking number. Please note, we do not fulfill orders over the weekend and any expedited order placed after 12:30pm, will be fulfilled the following business day.

settings.title: If I am located in the US, when will my order arrive?
settings.answer: Once your order has been shipped, we ask for 1-10 business days for delivery. Please note, packages are subject to carrier delays. Please note: We do not ship and/or deliver on weekends & some orders will require a signature. Please allow up to 2 days for your order to be dispatched. All orders received after 1:00 PM on Friday will be shipped the following Monday. * 2 Day Expedited/Overnight orders must be placed before 12:30pm PST to be sent out within the same business day. Expedited orders placed after 12:30pm PST will ship out on the following business day. Expedited orders are delivered Monday-Friday. There is no expedited option for weekend delivery.

settings.title: If I am located in the US, how much does shipping cost?
settings.answer: We offer free standard shipping for US orders over $200. If your US order is under $200, our standard shipping can vary between $8-$10. If you are needing to expedite your package, we offer overnight and 2-day delivery. This expedited shipping cost can vary between $18-$40. Please note, we do not fulfill orders over the weekend and any expedited order placed after 12:30pm, will be fulfilled the following business day.

settings.title: My package says "delivered" but I haven't received it, can you assist?
settings.answer: Oh no! Since the package was indicated that it was delivered, there are a few steps we suggest taking! Occasionally, packages are marked as delivered before they are physically at your address. Please allow 24 hours following a delivery confirmation before assuming that there is an issue with the delivery. - Contact your local post carrier and try to speak to your postal person directly, as sometimes they have a recollection of when and where they leave packages. - Make sure your mail area is secure, and leave a note to request that packages not be left unattended. - Is there a chance one of your neighbors mistakenly collected your package? If you have completed all of the above, please visit UPS to file a claim and provide our team with this claim number. We cannot be held responsible for orders that go missing after obtaining a ‚ÄúDelivered‚Äù status. Please ensure that you provide a shipping address that is attended during the day if your mail area is not secure. An official non-emergency police report must accompany all claims for packages not received after being marked "Delivered".

settings.title: How does your expedited shipping work?
settings.answer: All expedited orders need to be placed before 12:30pm PST to ship same day. If placed after 12:30pm PST, the order will ship out the following business day. We do not ship on weekends. Orders placed on Friday after 12:30pm, will ship Monday. Orders placed with 2-day shipping on Thursday before 12:30pm PST, will arrive by end of day Monday. Orders placed with 2-day shipping on Friday before 12:30pm, will arrive Tuesday.

settings.title: If I am located internationally, how much will shipping cost?
settings.answer: LWe ship all international packages via Passport Shipping that is then delivered to you through your local carrier. The shipping cost can vary depending on your location. Once you have entered in your location through our checkout page, the shipping fee will be displayed with any custom and duty tax prior to finalizing your order. Due to your location, shipping fees vary.

settings.title: If I am an Australian customer, when will my order arrive?
settings.answer: We offer free express shipping for all AU orders over $250AUD/$180USD (prices on the US site are still displayed in USD in the checkout). Orders under $250AUD/$180USD have a $15USD express option. Shipping time is 7-15 business days. All expedited and ground shipping can incur carrier delays that will extend this transit time.

settings.title: If I refused an international package, will I receive a refund?
settings.answer: We are sorry to hear you have refused your package! Once our team has received your returned package, we will process a refund for the items, minus the shipping fee. If your order was placed with our free international shipping, then we will deduct the cost incurred for returning your suit back to our warehouse.

settings.title: If I am an international customer, when will my order arrive?
settings.answer: Once your order has been shipped, we ask for 10-30 business days for delivery. Please note, packages are subject to carrier delays and all international packages will incur taxes by their local government.

settings.title: Give 15, Get 15
settings.text: Tell your friends about Monday Swimwear. They‚Äôll get 15% off and you‚Äôll get $15 for each friend who makes a purchase over $50. It‚Äôs a win-win.

settings.title: How do I join Monday Rewards?
settings.answer: It‚Äôs easy - simply sign up here. After that, every order you place will go towards your Reward status. Your tier will upgrade automatically once you reach those lifetime spends.

settings.title: What do I get for joining?
settings.answer: All members will receive an annual gift from us on their birthday. As you shop more, you‚Äôll earn more rewards.

settings.title: What does ‚Äúlifetime spend‚Äù mean?
settings.answer: Your lifetime spend is the total amount of money you‚Äôve spent with Monday, excluding any discounts or refunds. After you unlock a new tier, all you have to do to maintain your status is to spend $50 in the following 12 months.

settings.title: What‚Äôs the birthday gift?
settings.answer: Like all the best gifts, this one is a surprise. But here‚Äôs a little hint: it could be a discount, a freebie, or something just for you.

settings.title: Can I use all my referral credits at once?
settings.answer: Yes! You can use your credits however you like. Spend them all at once or spread them out over a few purchases. You‚Äôll have the option when checking out.

settings.title: How do I get my benefits?
settings.answer: All you have to do is shop! Any rewards or benefits will be automatically applied to your account.

settings.title: Will my past purchases count towards my Monday Rewards?
settings.answer: The last 12 months of spend from 4/21/2019 will count towards your tier status.

We use our own and third-party cookies to improve your experience and our services, and to analyze the use of our website. If you continue browsing, we take that to mean that you accept their use. See info.

settings.title: How To Care For Your Monday Styles
settings.text: Thoughtfully designed to be worn season after season, we have chosen our Monday Swimwear fabric for it's perfect combination of softness and resiliency. To keep your Monday Swimwear pieces in pristine condition, please follow our care instructions listed below.

settings.title: Wash your suit in fresh cold water with a gentle cleanser as soon as possible after wearing. Ideally, soak your suit in a bowl or the sink for at least for 20 minutes before adding a small cap full of a gentle hand soap that contains no moisturizers, or a gentle detergent specifically formulated for fabrics with a high spandex content, such as the one made by The Laundress or Le Paume. Gently work the soapy water through the entire suit and make sure to rinse thoroughly in cold water until all soap is gone.
Lay your suit flat to dry in the shade on a towel and use caution to never ring out the fabric or hang it, which could cause stretching and wear to the delicate fabric.
Make sure your suit is completely dry before putting away.

Never, ever wash your suit in the washing machine, even on the delicate/hand-wash cycle. Water temperatures in washing machines are incredibly hard to regulate and the detergents made for machines are far too strong for swimwear fabric.

Sun cream, tanning cream, chlorine, and hot tubs, can cause extreme damage and discolor suits, so we recommend to be cautious of wearing your suit or getting your suit in contact with these substances. In addition, any rough surface can cause pulling and snagging of the delicate fabric.
Caring for your suit in the appropriate manner is the best way possible to ensure that it will not deteriorate in an untimely manner.

To properly hand-wash beachwear, place it in a clean sink with cool water and mild detergent. Gently soak the garment, then remove from the soapy water. Drain the soapy water, rinse the sink and refill with cool water. Rinse the garments and repeat until the water is soap-free.
After washing, the best way to dry it is by laying the garment flat in an airy space. It's best to avoid the dryer since heat can damage the shape and quality.

settings.text: Our Monday Beachwear is designed from a variety of eco-friendly, lightweight and sustainably made fabrics. Some of our Linen styles are made from flax, which is a natural fiber that is recyclable and bio-degradable. It is considered one of the most eco-friendly fabrics because it grows naturally with little energy, and requires only rainwater to grow. When harvested, the entirety of the flax plant can be used for various products so no part goes to waste. Please follow our care instructions listed below for our beachwear.
